suggestions.original: To improve the picture organization, consider the following: 1. Adjust the positioning of the children to minimize overlapping and create a clearer separation between each figure. This will enhance the visual flow and make each child more distinct. 2. Standardize the size and placement of the fireworks to create a more balanced and harmonious background. This will help maintain the viewer's focus and reduce any potential distractions. 3. Ensure that the airplanes are evenly distributed and do not overlap with the fireworks. This will add to the overall clarity and organization of the scene. 4. Consider adding a subtle gradient or background color to differentiate the foreground from the background, adding depth to the composition. These adjustments will help create a more cohesive and visually appealing artwork.
